remarks: If the kernel and range of a homomorphism of left modules are finitely generated, then so is the domain.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Jan-2015.)  (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 6-May-2015.)

lmhmfgsplit.v $e |- V = ( T |`s ran F ) $.
lmhmfgsplit $p |- ( ( F e. ( S LMHom T ) /\ U e. LFinGen /\ V e. LFinGen ) -> S e. LFinGen ) $.
